title: Strengthening Hospitality Competencies: Second Language Acquisition Strategies: Understanding the Imparfait in French

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can explain the functional differences between French Imparfait tense and English present progressive/past tenses with 80% accuracy.
Learners can apply second-language comprehension strategies at least three times by comparing L1 (English) and L2 (French) sentences.
Learners can achieve a 20% or greater improvement in processing speed and accuracy for Imparfait in formative assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
